name: Pizza Hut | Vasco Da Gama, Goa

reviews.review_text:
I had an amazing experience at Pizza Hut in Vasco da Gama, Goa! The cheese on their pizzas is absolutely the best—rich, gooey, and packed with flavor. Their best-sellers are a must-try; you won’t regret it!

The staff here is incredibly polite and friendly, making the visit even more enjoyable. The ambiance is great, offering a perfect setting to relax and enjoy your meal.

Overall, I’m very happy with my experience and would highly recommend this place to anyone craving delicious pizza and excellent service. Can’t wait to visit again!

It was very loudly , too cramped up . I ordered mojito , the drink looked and tasted only like sugar water , had to add liminal e masala in it to drink it . The problem with this place is that there is no separate entry for Swiggy or  zomato guys to pick up their parcels, they all come at the cash counter to pick up their orders . Though the bill staff Sumitra was excellent

Pathetic service

Mexican fiesta pizza did not have red capsicum,  barely any olives, and zero jalapeños.

Went to the store and the Pizza Hut employee admitted to not have vegetables (red capsicum), but still carried on to deliver the order without notifying.

Base of Both pizzas was undercooked and not edible. Both pizzas were cold even though we were just across the street . Not at all Pizza Hut quality.

Tomato base sauce tasted old and stale.

No oregano or chill flakes provided by them.

No chilled coke available, had to order a warm coke and sprite.

Disappointed
